Description: Head bead. Bead in the form of a bird-like head in opaque red-brown glass. The ears and eyes are in the usual opaque yellow while the pupils are in translucent brown glass. Yellow thread decorations. Suspension loop on top of head broken. Tan core.
Bibliographic references: Glass / Catalogue of Greek and Roman Glass in the British Museum (394)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
